EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.LA Follow Up Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Attending the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop - LA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for attending the Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in LA, November 18, 2014. We hope our workshop gave you the opportunity to collaborate with your peers and get hands-on experience pushing an app on Pivotal Cloud Foundry.
Your feedback is important! Please take our short survey <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/QLH9HHW> so that we can continue to make future workshops informative and relevant.
We have made our presentation slides available here <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/tagged/pivotal%20cloud%20platform%20roadshow> and invite you to visit run.pivotal.io <http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Frun.pivotal.io%2F&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AFQjCNHuyCnQ-qnAEnP9k_3COqBzPeJ7Aw> to try Pivotal Web Services - simply upload your files and your app just works!
Interested in learning more about what Pivotal CF can do for your organization? Contact us <mailto:info@pivotal.io> to schedule a technical evaluation with our team.
Thank you again for joining us! We are looking forward to seeing you at the next event.
The Pivotal Team
